issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement in-memory DataSource
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4679](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4679). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement a new in-memory data source so that DataFusion can execute queries against data that is already loaded into memory.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4679?focusedCommentId=16782946) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
